name: Scuba Dupa
description:
Take the plunge into the deep sea and help Helmüt gather pearls. Who can dive the deepest? Challenge your friends to go further as you navigate your way into Davy Jones' locker whilst avoiding creatures of the deep.

Use your pearls to buy costumes and power ups to aid your quest. Packs of pearls, multi hit helmets and limited edition costumes are available as in app purchases for real cash.

All aboard!

You will love Scuba Dupa;
* FREE to play
* Control your dive either by tilting your device or tapping the screen
* Help Helmut navigate through the rocks and avoid the obstacles
* Watch out for the monster squid
* Challenge your friends to dive deeper

PLEASE NOTE: Scuba Dupa is completely free to play but you can also purchase packs of pearls, continue tokens and special costumes for real cash. If you do not want to spend money in the game, please just disable in app purchases on your device.

SUPPORTED DEVICES

Scuba Dupa is compatible with iPad Air, iPad 2 and up, iPad mini Retina, iPad mini, iPod 4 and up and iPhone 4 and up. It will not run on earlier devices.

Scuba Dupa supports Game Controllers made for iPhone, iPad and iPod touch. Game Controller support requires iOS 7 or later and is compatible with iPhone 5, iPhone 5s, iPhone 5c, iPad 2 or later, and iPod touch (5th generation).
